meanings: all one's wealth[assets], one's entire fortune, all one's property[money].
throw away all of one's fortune[property] on gambling
lose all of one's property by gambling
lose everything one have by gambling

examples.korean: There are people who strictly deprive themselves of each and every eatable, drinkable, and smokable which has in any way acquired a shady reputation. They pay this price for health.
